div.header: Hirsch Academy is closed through the end of the school year. La Academia Hirsch está cerrada hasta el final del año escolar. Haga clic aquí para obtener información adicional. Click here for additional information:

section.h5: Welcome to Hirsch Academy, Home of the Hawks!

section.p: Hirsch Academy: A Challenge Foundation Academy is a tuition-free, public charter school in Scottsdale, Arizona serving grades K–5. See how our close community of teachers, staff, volunteers and families work together to insure the success of our students!

section.p: Our students are learning about nature through our community garden both during and after school. Kindergarten students were excited to pick carrots from our fall harvest which corresponded with their Core Knowledge Language Arts curriculum domains on plants and farms. This was a great way for them to apply what they learned in the classroom! After school, our Girls Scouts troop were examining the flowers and vegetable in the garden with magnifying glasses to earn merit badges!

Throughout the fall semester, Hirsch students have benefited from several experiential learning opportunities both during and after school. Students have learned about grammar, math, geography and language arts by playing fun and educational games, participating in art projects and engaging in creative movement. Our kindergarten students recently practiced their number recognition by rolling dice and discussing the concepts of more, less and equal numbers. In our free after-school tutoring program, our kindergarten and 1st grade students have been sounding out consonant-vowel-consonant words like r-u-g with creative movements to recognize the different phonemes, while other 1st and 2nd grade students were building silly sentences with the different parts of speech by playing a game with flash cards.

section.header: Come see what we have to offer!

section.p: Quality Education and Programs built on a classical state approved curriculum including music, dance and the arts. Students, teachers and families work together in a welcoming and nurturing environment to foster expectation, achievement and results.
Dedicated Teachers leading small classes to address your child’s unique learning needs while offering after school and weekend tutoring to devote more time to your student’s success.

A Supportive Place for Families to Grow – Hirsch works with our partner organizations at the Paiute Neighborhood Center: The Scottsdale Family Resource Center, Head Start and Boys & Girls Club to help all family members flourish. Hirsch family and community volunteers proudly dedicate their time to make our school a caring environment for all.
